name: Qingdao
title: Qingdao - Traveling China like your home yard
heroSubtitle: The Pearl of the Yellow Sea
overview: Qingdao is a coastal city in Shandong Province, known for its beautiful beaches, European-style architecture, and being the home of Tsingtao Beer. This port city combines natural coastal beauty with a rich brewing heritage and serves as a major economic and cultural hub in eastern China.

highlights.attractions: Badaguan Scenic Area, May Fourth Square, Tsingtao Beer Museum, Laoshan Mountain, Zhanqiao Pier
highlights.cuisine: Tsingtao Beer, Seafood, Laoshan Mineral Water, Clams, Sea Cucumber
highlights.bestTime: Summer (June-August) for beach activities and beer festivals

dishes.name: Tsingtao Beer
dishes.description: World-famous Chinese beer brewed with Laoshan spring water, known for its crisp and refreshing taste.

dishes.name: Qingdao Clams
dishes.description: Fresh clams from the Yellow Sea, often stir-fried with garlic and chili.

dishes.name: Sea Cucumber
dishes.description: Premium seafood delicacy, often braised with shiitake mushrooms and vegetables.

foodStreets.name: Beer Street
foodStreets.description: Historic street lined with beer gardens and seafood restaurants near the Tsingtao Brewery.

foodStreets.name: Taidong Night Market
foodStreets.description: Vibrant night market offering fresh seafood, local snacks, and street food.

gettingThere: By Air: Qingdao Jiaodong International Airport (TAO) with domestic and international flights.
By Train: High-speed rail connections to Beijing, Shanghai, Jinan, and other major cities.
By Bus: Long-distance bus services connecting to nearby cities and provinces.
gettingAround: Metro: Qingdao Metro provides efficient transportation to major attractions and districts.
Bus: Comprehensive public bus network covering the urban area and coastal areas.
Taxi/Didi: Readily available for convenient city exploration.
Walking: The coastal areas and old town are best explored on foot.

activities: Morning: Visit May Fourth Square and the modern coastal area.
Afternoon: Explore Badaguan Scenic Area with its European-style villas and gardens.
Evening: Stroll along Zhanqiao Pier and enjoy fresh seafood at a coastal restaurant.
Morning: Tour the Tsingtao Beer Museum and learn about the brewing process.
Afternoon: Visit Beer Street for tastings and local beer culture.
Evening: Enjoy a traditional German-style beer garden experience.
Morning: Hike Laoshan Mountain, known as the birthplace of Taoism and source of Laoshan mineral water.
Afternoon: Visit ancient temples and enjoy panoramic views of the Yellow Sea.
